    Pages.add_library — Function.

    Add a JS library to the current page from a url.

    Pages.add_select

    Pages.assign
    Pages.block — Function.

    Block Julia control flow until until callback"notify" is called.

    Pages.broadcast — Function.

    Broadcast a message to all connected web pages to be interpetted by WebSocket listener. For example, in JavaScript:

    var sock = new WebSocket('ws://'+window.location.host); sock.onmessage = function( message ){ var msg = JSON.parse(message.data); console.log(msg); }

    Pages.callbacks
    Pages.conditions
    Pages.connections
    Pages.eval
    Pages.examples
    Pages.include
    Pages.launch
    Pages.message — Function.

    Send a message to the specified connection to be interpetted by WebSocket listener. For example, in JavaScript:

    var sock = new WebSocket('ws://'+window.location.host); sock.onmessage = function( message ){ var msg = JSON.parse(message.data); console.log(msg); }
